messages.subject: Nagakura made a handbag?????
messages.msgSnippet: http://8614.teacup.com/hijikata/bbs2 the poster provided information on Nagakura and how he made a bag/handbag/knapsack of some sort... now 3 internet
messages.messageBody:
http://8614.teacup.com/hijikata/bbs2
the poster provided information on Nagakura and how he made a
bag/handbag/knapsack of some sort...

now 3 internet translators translated that bag as a "louis vuitton"
bag (stop laughing)....these online translators are HILARIOUS

ok what I do know is that the poster is interested in historical
Nagakura, and he/she even built a site for him
http://www.geocities.jp/chivalrous_samurai/index.html
